items.title: 数论学习笔记
items.content_html:
# 反演

# 二项式反演

如果有 :
f(x)=∑i=0n(−1)i∗(ni)∗g(i) f(x) = \sum _{i = 0} ^{n} (-1) ^{i} * \binom{n}{i} * g(i) f(x)=∑i=0n​(−1)i∗(in​)∗g(i)

那么有 :
g(x)=∑i=0n(−1)i∗(ni)∗f(i) g(x) = \sum _{i = 0} ^{n} (-1) ^{i} * \binom{n}{i} * f(i) g(x)=∑i=0n​(−1)i∗(in​)∗f(i)

# 单位根反演

[n∣x]=1n∑i=0n−1(ωnk)i [n|x] = \frac{1}{n} \sum _{i = 0} ^{n - 1} \left( \omega _{n} ^{k} \right) ^{i} [n∣x]=n1​i=0∑n−1​(ωnk​)i

# 类欧几里得算法

f(a,b,c,n)=∑i=0n⌊ai+bc⌋g(a,b,c,n)=∑i=0n⌊ai+bc⌋2h(a,b,c,n)=∑i=0ni∗⌊ai+bc⌋\begin{aligned} f(a,b,c,n) & = \sum _{i = 0} ^{n} \left\lfloor \frac{ai + b}{c} \right\rfloor \\ g(a,b,c,n) & = \sum _{i = 0} ^{n} \left\lfloor \frac{ai + b}{c} \right\rfloor ^{2} \\ h(a,b,c,n) & = \sum _{i = 0} ^{n} i \ast \left\lfloor \frac{ai + b}{c} \right\rfloor \\ \end{aligned} f(a,b,c,n)g(a,b,c,n)h(a,b,c,n)​=i=0∑n​⌊cai+b​⌋=i=0∑n​⌊cai+b​⌋2=i=0∑n​i∗⌊cai+b​⌋​

# f(a,b,c,n)=∑i=0n⌊ai+bc⌋f(a,b,c,n) = \sum _{i = 0} ^{n} \lfloor \frac{ai + b}{c} \rfloorf(a,b,c,n)=∑i=0n​⌊cai+b​⌋

(1). 对于 a≥ca \ge ca≥c 或 b≥cb \ge cb≥c 时

f(a,b,c,n)=∑i=0n⌊ai+bc⌋=∑i=0n⌊(⌊a/c⌋c+a%c) i+⌊b/c⌋c+b%cc⌋=∑i=0n(⌊a/c⌋i+⌊b/c⌋+⌊(a%c) i+b%cc⌋)=n (n+1)2∗⌊a/c⌋c+(n+1)∗⌊b/c⌋c+∑i=0n⌊(a%c) i+b%cc⌋=n (n+1)2∗⌊a/c⌋c+(n+1)∗⌊b/c⌋c+f(a%c, b%c, c, n)\begin{aligned} f(a,b,c,n) & = \sum _{i = 0} ^{n} \left\lfloor \frac{ai + b}{c} \right\rfloor \\ & = \sum _{i = 0} ^{n} \left\lfloor \frac{ ( \lfloor a / c \rfloor c + a \% c ) \, i + \lfloor b / c \rfloor c + b \% c } {c} \right\rfloor \\ & = \sum _{i = 0} ^{n} \left( \lfloor a / c \rfloor i + \lfloor b / c \rfloor + \left\lfloor \frac{ (a \% c) \, i + b \% c } {c} \right\rfloor \right) \\ & = \frac{n \, (n + 1)}{2} * \lfloor a / c \rfloor c + (n + 1) * \lfloor b / c \rfloor c + \sum _{i = 0} ^{n} \left\lfloor \frac{ (a \% c) \, i + b \% c } {c} \right\rfloor \\ & = \frac{n \, (n + 1)}{2} * \lfloor a / c \rfloor c + (n + 1) * \lfloor b / c \rfloor c + f(a \% c,\, b \% c,\, c,\, n) \\ \end{aligned} f(a,b,c,n)​=i=0∑n​⌊cai+b​⌋=i=0∑n​⌊c(⌊a/c⌋c+a%c)i+⌊b/c⌋c+b%c​⌋=i=0∑n​(⌊a/c⌋i+⌊b/c⌋+⌊c(a%c)i+b%c​⌋)=2n(n+1)​∗⌊a/c⌋c+(n+1)∗⌊b/c⌋c+i=0∑n​⌊c(a%c)i+b%c​⌋=2n(n+1)​∗⌊a/c⌋c+(n+1)∗⌊b/c⌋c+f(a%c,b%c,c,n)​

(2). 对于 a<ca < ca<c 且 b<cb < cb<c 时

记 m=⌊an+bc⌋m=\lfloor \frac{an+b}{c} \rfloorm=⌊can+b​⌋ , 则有 :

f(a,b,c,n)=∑i=0n⌊ai+bc⌋=∑i=0n∑j=0m−1[j<⌊ai+bc⌋]=∑i=0n∑j=0m−1[j+1≤ai+bc]=∑i=0n∑j=0m−1[jc+c−b≤ai]=∑i=0n∑j=0m−1[jc+c−b−1a<i]=∑j=0m−1∑i=0n[jc+c−b−1a<i]=∑j=0m−1(n−⌊jc+c−b−1a⌋)=nm−f(c, c−b−1, a, m−1)\begin{aligned} \\ f(a,b,c,n) & = \sum _{i = 0} ^{n} \left\lfloor \frac{ai + b}{c} \right\rfloor \\ & = \sum _{i = 0} ^{n} \sum _{j = 0} ^ {m-1} \left[ j < \left\lfloor \frac{ai + b}{c} \right\rfloor \right] \\ & = \sum _{i = 0} ^{n} \sum _{j = 0} ^ {m-1} \left[ j + 1 \leq \frac{ai + b}{c} \right] \\ & = \sum _{i = 0} ^{n} \sum _{j = 0} ^ {m-1} \left[ jc + c - b \leq ai \right] \\ & = \sum _{i = 0} ^{n} \sum _{j = 0} ^ {m-1} \left[ \frac{jc + c - b - 1}{a} < i \right] \\ & = \sum _{j = 0} ^ {m-1} \sum _{i = 0} ^{n} \left[ \frac{jc + c - b - 1}{a} < i \right] \\ & = \sum _{j = 0} ^ {m-1} \left( n - \left\lfloor \frac{jc + c - b - 1}{a} \right\rfloor \right) \\ & = nm - f(c,\, c-b-1,\, a,\, m - 1) \\ \end{aligned} f(a,b,c,n)​=i=0∑n​⌊cai+b​⌋=i=0∑n​j=0∑m−1​[j<⌊cai+b​⌋]=i=0∑n​j=0∑m−1​[j+1≤cai+b​]=i=0∑n​j=0∑m−1​[jc+c−b≤ai]=i=0∑n​j=0∑m−1​[ajc+c−b−1​<i]=j=0∑m−1​i=0∑n​[ajc+c−b−1​<i]=j=0∑m−1​(n−⌊ajc+c−b−1​⌋)=nm−f(c,c−b−1,a,m−1)​

综上，可得以下式子 :

f(a,b,c,n)={n (n+1)2∗⌊ac⌋+(n+1)∗⌊bc⌋+f(a%c, b%c, c, n),a≥c  or  b≥cnm−f(c, c−b−1, a, m−1),a<c  and  a<c\begin{aligned} f(a,b,c,n) = \begin{cases} \frac{n \, (n + 1)}{2} * \left\lfloor \frac{a}{c} \right\rfloor + (n + 1) * \left\lfloor \frac{b}{c} \right\rfloor + f(a \% c,\, b \% c,\, c,\, n) & , a \ge c \;or\; b \ge c \\ nm - f(c,\, c-b-1,\, a,\, m - 1) & , a < c \;and\; a < c \end{cases} \end{aligned} f(a,b,c,n)={2n(n+1)​∗⌊ca​⌋+(n+1)∗⌊cb​⌋+f(a%c,b%c,c,n)nm−f(c,c−b−1,a,m−1)​,a≥corb≥c,a<canda<c​​

# g(a,b,c,n)=∑i=0n⌊ai+bc⌋2g(a,b,c,n) = \sum _{i = 0} ^n \lfloor \frac{ai + b}{c} \rfloor ^2g(a,b,c,n)=∑i=0n​⌊cai+b​⌋2

(1). 对于 a≥ca \ge ca≥c 或 b≥cb \ge cb≥c 时

g(a,b,c,n)=∑i=0n⌊ai+bc⌋2=∑i=0n⌊(⌊a/c⌋+a%c)i+(⌊b/c⌋+b%c)c⌋2=∑i=0n(⌊a/c⌋i+⌊b/c⌋+⌊(a%c)i+b%cc⌋)2=∑i=0n((⌊a/c⌋i+⌊b/c⌋)2+⌊(a%c)i+(b%c)c⌋2+2i⌊a/c⌋⌊b/c⌋⌊(a%c)i+b%cc⌋)=∑i=0n(⌊a/c⌋i+⌊b/c⌋)2+∑i=0n⌊(a%c)i+(b%c)c⌋2+∑i=0n2i⌊a/c⌋⌊b/c⌋⌊(a%c)i+b%cc⌋=∑i=0n⌊a/c⌋2i2+∑i=0n⌊b/c⌋2+∑i=0n2i⌊a/c⌋⌊b/c⌋+∑i=0n⌊(a%c)i+(b%c)c⌋2+∑i=0n2i⌊a/c⌋⌊b/c⌋⌊(a%c)i+b%cc⌋=⌊a/c⌋2∑i=0ni2+∑i=0n⌊b/c⌋2+2⌊a/c⌋⌊b/c⌋∑i=0ni+∑i=0n⌊(a%c)i+(b%c)c⌋2+2⌊a/c⌋⌊b/c⌋∑i=0ni⌊(a%c)i+b%cc⌋=n(n+1)(n∗2+1)⌊a/c⌋26+(n+1)⌊b/c⌋2+2n⌊a/c⌋⌊b/c⌋+g(a%c, b%c, c, n)+2⌊a/c⌋⌊b/c⌋h(a%c, b%c, c, n)\begin{aligned} g(a,b,c,n) & = \sum _{i = 0} ^{n} \left\lfloor \frac{ai + b}{c} \right\rfloor ^{2} \\ & = \sum _{i = 0} ^{n} \left\lfloor \frac{ ( \lfloor a / c \rfloor + a \% c ) i + ( \lfloor b / c \rfloor + b \% c ) }{c} \right\rfloor ^ {2} \\ & = \sum _{i = 0} ^{n} \left( \lfloor a / c \rfloor i + \lfloor b / c \rfloor + \left\lfloor \frac{ (a \% c) i + b \% c }{c} \right\rfloor \right) ^ {2} \\ & = \sum _{i = 0} ^{n} \left( ( \lfloor a / c \rfloor i + \lfloor b / c \rfloor ) ^{2} + \left\lfloor \frac{ (a \% c) i + (b \% c) }{c} \right\rfloor ^ {2} + 2 i \lfloor a / c \rfloor \lfloor b / c \rfloor \left\lfloor \frac{ (a \% c) i + b \% c }{c} \right\rfloor \right) \\ & = \sum _{i = 0} ^{n} ( \lfloor a / c \rfloor i + \lfloor b / c \rfloor ) ^{2} + \sum _{i = 0} ^{n} \left\lfloor \frac{ (a \% c) i + (b \% c) }{c} \right\rfloor ^ {2} + \sum _{i = 0} ^{n} 2 i \lfloor a / c \rfloor \lfloor b / c \rfloor \left\lfloor \frac{ (a \% c) i + b \% c }{c} \right\rfloor \\ & = \sum _{i = 0} ^{n} \lfloor a / c \rfloor ^{2} i ^{2} + \sum _{i = 0} ^{n} \lfloor b / c \rfloor ^{2} + \sum _{i = 0} ^{n} 2 i \lfloor a / c \rfloor \lfloor b / c \rfloor + \sum _{i = 0} ^{n} \left\lfloor \frac{ (a \% c) i + (b \% c) }{c} \right\rfloor ^ {2} + \sum _{i = 0} ^{n} 2 i \lfloor a / c \rfloor \lfloor b / c \rfloor \left\lfloor \frac{ (a \% c) i + b \% c }{c} \right\rfloor \\ & = \lfloor a / c \rfloor ^{2} \sum _{i = 0} ^{n} i ^{2} + \sum _{i = 0} ^{n} \lfloor b / c \rfloor ^{2} + 2 \lfloor a / c \rfloor \lfloor b / c \rfloor \sum _{i = 0} ^{n} i + \sum _{i = 0} ^{n} \left\lfloor \frac{ (a \% c) i + (b \% c) }{c} \right\rfloor ^ {2} + 2 \lfloor a / c \rfloor \lfloor b / c \rfloor \sum _{i = 0} ^{n} i \left\lfloor \frac{ (a \% c) i + b \% c }{c} \right\rfloor \\ & = \frac{n (n + 1) (n \ast 2 + 1) \lfloor a / c \rfloor ^{2}} {6} + (n + 1) \lfloor b / c \rfloor ^{2} + 2 n \lfloor a / c \rfloor \lfloor b / c \rfloor + g(a \% c,\, b \% c,\, c,\, n) + 2 \lfloor a / c \rfloor \lfloor b / c \rfloor h(a \% c,\, b \% c,\, c,\, n) \end{aligned} g(a,b,c,n)​=i=0∑n​⌊cai+b​⌋2=i=0∑n​⌊c(⌊a/c⌋+a%c)i+(⌊b/c⌋+b%c)​⌋2=i=0∑n​(⌊a/c⌋i+⌊b/c⌋+⌊c(a%c)i+b%c​⌋)2=i=0∑n​((⌊a/c⌋i+⌊b/c⌋)2+⌊c(a%c)i+(b%c)​⌋2+2i⌊a/c⌋⌊b/c⌋⌊c(a%c)i+b%c​⌋)=i=0∑n​(⌊a/c⌋i+⌊b/c⌋)2+i=0∑n​⌊c(a%c)i+(b%c)​⌋2+i=0∑n​2i⌊a/c⌋⌊b/c⌋⌊c(a%c)i+b%c​⌋=i=0∑n​⌊a/c⌋2i2+i=0∑n​⌊b/c⌋2+i=0∑n​2i⌊a/c⌋⌊b/c⌋+i=0∑n​⌊c(a%c)i+(b%c)​⌋2+i=0∑n​2i⌊a/c⌋⌊b/c⌋⌊c(a%c)i+b%c​⌋=⌊a/c⌋2i=0∑n​i2+i=0∑n​⌊b/c⌋2+2⌊a/c⌋⌊b/c⌋i=0∑n​i+i=0∑n​⌊c(a%c)i+(b%c)​⌋2+2⌊a/c⌋⌊b/c⌋i=0∑n​i⌊c(a%c)i+b%c​⌋=6n(n+1)(n∗2+1)⌊a/c⌋2​+(n+1)⌊b/c⌋2+2n⌊a/c⌋⌊b/c⌋+g(a%c,b%c,c,n)+2⌊a/c⌋⌊b/c⌋h(a%c,b%c,c,n)​

(2). 对于 a<ca < ca<c 且 b<cb < cb<c 时

已知 x2=(2∑i=1xi)−x=(2∑i=0xi)−xx ^{2} = \left( 2 \sum _{i = 1} ^{x} i \right) -x = \left( 2 \sum _{i = 0} ^{x} i \right) -xx2=(2∑i=1x​i)−x=(2∑i=0x​i)−x

记 m=⌊an+bc⌋m = \lfloor \frac{an + b}{c} \rfloorm=⌊can+b​⌋, 则有 :

g(a,b,c,n)=∑i=0n⌊ai+bc⌋2=2∑i=0n∑j=0⌊ai+bc⌋j−∑i=0n⌊ai+bc⌋=2∑i=0n∑j=0m−1j[  j<⌊ai+bc⌋  ]−f(a,b,c,n)=2∑i=0n∑j=0m−1j[  jc+c−b−1a<i  ]−f(a,b,c,n)=2∑j=0m−1∑i=0nj[  jc+c−b−1a<i  ]−f(a,b,c,n)=2∑j=0m−1j(n−⌊jc+c−b−1a⌋)−f(a,b,c,n)=nm(m−1)−2h(c, c−b−1, a, m−1)−f(a,b,c,n)\begin{aligned} g(a,b,c,n) & = \sum _{i = 0} ^{n} \left\lfloor \frac{ai + b}{c} \right\rfloor ^{2} \\ & = 2 \sum _{i = 0} ^{n} \sum _{j = 0} ^{ \lfloor \frac{ai + b}{c} \rfloor} j - \sum _{i = 0} ^{n} \left\lfloor \frac{ai + b}{c} \right\rfloor \\ & = 2 \sum _{i = 0} ^{n} \sum _{j = 0} ^{m-1} j \left[ \; j < \left\lfloor \frac{ai + b}{c} \right\rfloor \; \right] - f(a, b, c, n) \\ & = 2 \sum _{i = 0} ^{n} \sum _{j = 0} ^{m-1} j \left[ \; \frac{jc + c - b - 1}{a} < i \; \right] - f(a, b, c, n) \\ & = 2 \sum _{j = 0} ^{m-1} \sum _{i = 0} ^{n} j \left[ \; \frac{jc + c - b - 1}{a} < i \; \right] - f(a, b, c, n) \\ & = 2 \sum _{j = 0} ^{m-1} j \left( n - \left\lfloor \frac{jc + c - b - 1}{a} \right\rfloor \right) - f(a, b, c, n) \\ & = n m (m - 1) - 2 h(c,\, c - b - 1,\, a,\, m - 1) - f(a, b, c, n) \end{aligned} g(a,b,c,n)​=i=0∑n​⌊cai+b​⌋2=2i=0∑n​j=0∑⌊cai+b​⌋​j−i=0∑n​⌊cai+b​⌋=2i=0∑n​j=0∑m−1​j[j<⌊cai+b​⌋]−f(a,b,c,n)=2i=0∑n​j=0∑m−1​j[ajc+c−b−1​<i]−f(a,b,c,n)=2j=0∑m−1​i=0∑n​j[ajc+c−b−1​<i]−f(a,b,c,n)=2j=0∑m−1​j(n−⌊ajc+c−b−1​⌋)−f(a,b,c,n)=nm(m−1)−2h(c,c−b−1,a,m−1)−f(a,b,c,n)​

综上，可得以下式子 :

g(a,b,c,n)={n(n+1)(n∗2+1)⌊a/c⌋26+(n+1)⌊b/c⌋2+2n⌊a/c⌋⌊b/c⌋+g(a%c, b%c, c, n)+2⌊a/c⌋⌊b/c⌋h(a%c, b%c, c, n),a≥c  or  b≥cnm(m−1)−2h(c, c−b−1, a, m−1)−f(a,b,c,n),a<c  and  a<c\begin{aligned} g(a,b,c,n) = \begin{cases} \frac{n (n + 1) (n \ast 2 + 1) \lfloor a / c \rfloor ^{2}} {6} + (n + 1) \lfloor b / c \rfloor ^{2} + 2 n \lfloor a / c \rfloor \lfloor b / c \rfloor + g(a \% c,\, b \% c,\, c,\, n) + 2 \lfloor a / c \rfloor \lfloor b / c \rfloor h(a \% c,\, b \% c,\, c,\, n) & , a \ge c \;or\; b \ge c \\ n m (m - 1) - 2 h(c,\, c - b - 1,\, a,\, m - 1) - f(a, b, c, n) & , a < c \;and\; a < c \end{cases} \end{aligned} g(a,b,c,n)={6n(n+1)(n∗2+1)⌊a/c⌋2​+(n+1)⌊b/c⌋2+2n⌊a/c⌋⌊b/c⌋+g(a%c,b%c,c,n)+2⌊a/c⌋⌊b/c⌋h(a%c,b%c,c,n)nm(m−1)−2h(c,c−b−1,a,m−1)−f(a,b,c,n)​,a≥corb≥c,a<canda<c​​

# h(a,b,c,n)=∑i=0ni⌊ai+bc⌋h(a,b,c,n) = \sum _{i=0}^{n} i \left\lfloor \frac{ai+b}{c} \right\rfloorh(a,b,c,n)=∑i=0n​i⌊cai+b​⌋

(1). 对于 a≥ca \ge ca≥c 或 b≥cb \ge cb≥c 时

h(a,b,c,n)=∑i=0ni∗⌊ai+bc⌋=∑i=0ni∗⌊(⌊a/c⌋c+a%c) i+⌊b/c⌋c+b%cc⌋=∑i=0ni∗(⌊a/c⌋i+⌊b/c⌋+⌊(a%c) i+b%cc⌋)=∑i=0ni2⌊a/c⌋+∑i=0ni⌊b/c⌋+∑i=0ni∗⌊(a%c) i+b%cc⌋=n(n+1)(n∗2+1)⌊a/c⌋6+n(n+1)⌊b/c⌋2+h(a%c, b%c, c,n)\begin{aligned} h(a,b,c,n) & = \sum _{i = 0} ^{n} i \ast \left\lfloor \frac{ai + b}{c} \right\rfloor \\ & = \sum _{i = 0} ^{n} i \ast \left\lfloor \frac{ ( \lfloor a / c \rfloor c + a \% c ) \, i + \lfloor b / c \rfloor c + b \% c } {c} \right\rfloor \\ & = \sum _{i = 0} ^{n} i \ast \left( \lfloor a / c \rfloor i + \lfloor b / c \rfloor + \left\lfloor \frac{ (a \% c) \, i + b \% c } {c} \right\rfloor \right) \\ & = \sum _{i = 0} ^{n} i ^{2} \lfloor a / c \rfloor + \sum _{i = 0} ^{n} i \lfloor b / c \rfloor + \sum _{i = 0} ^{n} i \ast \left\lfloor \frac{ (a \% c) \, i + b \% c } {c} \right\rfloor \\ & = \frac{n (n + 1) ( n * 2 +1) \lfloor a / c \rfloor}{6} + \frac{n (n + 1) \lfloor b / c \rfloor}{2} + h(a \% c,\, b \% c,\, c, n) \end{aligned} h(a,b,c,n)​=i=0∑n​i∗⌊cai+b​⌋=i=0∑n​i∗⌊c(⌊a/c⌋c+a%c)i+⌊b/c⌋c+b%c​⌋=i=0∑n​i∗(⌊a/c⌋i+⌊b/c⌋+⌊c(a%c)i+b%c​⌋)=i=0∑n​i2⌊a/c⌋+i=0∑n​i⌊b/c⌋+i=0∑n​i∗⌊c(a%c)i+b%c​⌋=6n(n+1)(n∗2+1)⌊a/c⌋​+2n(n+1)⌊b/c⌋​+h(a%c,b%c,c,n)​

(2). 对于 a<ca < ca<c 且 b<cb < cb<c 时

记 G=⌊jc+c−b−1a⌋G = \left\lfloor \frac{jc + c - b - 1 }{a} \right\rfloorG=⌊ajc+c−b−1​⌋, 则有 :

h(a,b,c,n)=∑i=0ni∗⌊ai+bc⌋=∑i=0ni∑j=0m−1[j<⌊ai+bc⌋]=∑i=0n∑j=0m−1i∗[jc+c−b−1a<i]=∑j=0m−1∑i=0ni∗[G<i]=∑j=0m−1∑i=G+1ni=12∑j=0m−1(n+G+1)(n−G)=12∑j=0m−1(n2−G2+n−G)=12∑j=0m−1n2−12∑j=0m−1G2+12∑j=0m−1n−12∑j=0m−1G=12(n2m+nm−f(c, c−b−1, a,m−1)−g(c, c−b−1, a,m−1))=12nm(n+1)−12f(c, c−b−1, a,m−1)−12g(c, c−b−1, a,m−1)\begin{aligned} h(a,b,c,n) & = \sum _{i = 0} ^{n} i \ast \left\lfloor \frac{ai + b}{c} \right\rfloor \\ & = \sum _{i = 0} ^{n} i \sum _{j = 0} ^{m - 1} \left[ j < \left\lfloor \frac{ai + b}{c} \right\rfloor \right] \\ & = \sum _{i = 0} ^{n} \sum _{j = 0} ^{m - 1} i \ast \left[ \frac{jc + c - b - 1}{a} < i \right] \\ & = \sum _{j = 0} ^{m - 1} \sum _{i = 0} ^{n} i \ast \left[ G < i \right] \\ & = \sum _{j = 0} ^{m - 1} \sum _{i = G + 1} ^{n} i \\ & = \frac{1}{2} \sum _{j = 0} ^{m - 1} (n + G + 1)(n - G) \\ & = \frac{1}{2} \sum _{j = 0} ^{m - 1} (n ^ {2} - G ^ {2} + n - G) \\ & = \frac{1}{2} \sum _{j = 0} ^{m - 1} n ^ {2} - \frac{1}{2} \sum _{j = 0} ^{m - 1} G ^ {2} + \frac{1}{2} \sum _{j = 0} ^{m - 1} n - \frac{1}{2} \sum _{j = 0} ^{m - 1} G \\ & = \frac{1}{2} \left( n ^ {2} m + n m - f(c,\, c - b - 1,\, a, m - 1) - g(c,\, c - b - 1,\, a, m - 1) \right) \\ & = \frac{1}{2} n m (n + 1) - \frac{1}{2} f(c,\, c - b - 1,\, a, m - 1) - \frac{1}{2} g(c,\, c - b - 1,\, a, m - 1) \\ \end{aligned} h(a,b,c,n)​=i=0∑n​i∗⌊cai+b​⌋=i=0∑n​ij=0∑m−1​[j<⌊cai+b​⌋]=i=0∑n​j=0∑m−1​i∗[ajc+c−b−1​<i]=j=0∑m−1​i=0∑n​i∗[G<i]=j=0∑m−1​i=G+1∑n​i=21​j=0∑m−1​(n+G+1)(n−G)=21​j=0∑m−1​(n2−G2+n−G)=21​j=0∑m−1​n2−21​j=0∑m−1​G2+21​j=0∑m−1​n−21​j=0∑m−1​G=21​(n2m+nm−f(c,c−b−1,a,m−1)−g(c,c−b−1,a,m−1))=21​nm(n+1)−21​f(c,c−b−1,a,m−1)−21​g(c,c−b−1,a,m−1)​

综上，可得以下式子 :

h(a,b,c,n)={n(n+1)(n∗2+1)⌊a/c⌋6+n(n+1)⌊b/c⌋2+h(a%c, b%c, c,n),a≥c  or  b≥c12nm(n+1)−12f(c, c−b−1, a,m−1)−12g(c, c−b−1, a,m−1),a<c  and  a<c\begin{aligned} h(a,b,c,n) = \begin{cases} \frac{n (n + 1) ( n * 2 +1) \lfloor a / c \rfloor}{6} + \frac{n (n + 1) \lfloor b / c \rfloor}{2} + h(a \% c,\, b \% c,\, c, n) & , a \ge c \;or\; b \ge c \\ \frac{1}{2} n m (n + 1) - \frac{1}{2} f(c,\, c - b - 1,\, a, m - 1) - \frac{1}{2} g(c,\, c - b - 1,\, a, m - 1) & , a < c \;and\; a < c \end{cases} \end{aligned} h(a,b,c,n)={6n(n+1)(n∗2+1)⌊a/c⌋​+2n(n+1)⌊b/c⌋​+h(a%c,b%c,c,n)21​nm(n+1)−21​f(c,c−b−1,a,m−1)−21​g(c,c−b−1,a,m−1)​,a≥corb≥c,a<canda<c​​

# 总结:

f(a,b,c,n)={n (n+1)2∗⌊ac⌋+(n+1)∗⌊bc⌋+f(a%c, b%c, c, n),a≥c  or  b≥cnm−f(c, c−b−1, a, m−1),a<c  and  a<cg(a,b,c,n)={n(n+1)(n∗2+1)⌊a/c⌋26+(n+1)⌊b/c⌋2+2n⌊a/c⌋⌊b/c⌋+g(a%c, b%c, c, n)+2⌊a/c⌋⌊b/c⌋h(a%c, b%c, c, n),a≥c  or  b≥cnm(m−1)−2h(c, c−b−1, a, m−1)−f(a,b,c,n),a<c  and  a<ch(a,b,c,n)={n(n+1)(n∗2+1)⌊a/c⌋6+n(n+1)⌊b/c⌋2+h(a%c, b%c, c,n),a≥c  or  b≥c12nm(n+1)−12f(c, c−b−1, a,m−1)−12g(c, c−b−1, a,m−1),a<c  and  a<c\begin{aligned} f(a,b,c,n) & = \begin{cases} \frac{n \, (n + 1)}{2} * \left\lfloor \frac{a}{c} \right\rfloor + (n + 1) * \left\lfloor \frac{b}{c} \right\rfloor + f(a \% c,\, b \% c,\, c,\, n) & , a \ge c \;or\; b \ge c \\ nm - f(c,\, c-b-1,\, a,\, m - 1) & , a < c \;and\; a < c \end{cases} \\ g(a,b,c,n) & = \begin{cases} \frac{n (n + 1) (n \ast 2 + 1) \lfloor a / c \rfloor ^{2}} {6} + (n + 1) \lfloor b / c \rfloor ^{2} + 2 n \lfloor a / c \rfloor \lfloor b / c \rfloor + g(a \% c,\, b \% c,\, c,\, n) + 2 \lfloor a / c \rfloor \lfloor b / c \rfloor h(a \% c,\, b \% c,\, c,\, n) & , a \ge c \;or\; b \ge c \\ n m (m - 1) - 2 h(c,\, c - b - 1,\, a,\, m - 1) - f(a, b, c, n) & , a < c \;and\; a < c \end{cases} \\ h(a,b,c,n) & = \begin{cases} \frac{n (n + 1) ( n * 2 +1) \lfloor a / c \rfloor}{6} + \frac{n (n + 1) \lfloor b / c \rfloor}{2} + h(a \% c,\, b \% c,\, c, n) & , a \ge c \;or\; b \ge c \\ \frac{1}{2} n m (n + 1) - \frac{1}{2} f(c,\, c - b - 1,\, a, m - 1) - \frac{1}{2} g(c,\, c - b - 1,\, a, m - 1) & , a < c \;and\; a < c \end{cases} \end{aligned} f(a,b,c,n)g(a,b,c,n)h(a,b,c,n)​={2n(n+1)​∗⌊ca​⌋+(n+1)∗⌊cb​⌋+f(a%c,b%c,c,n)nm−f(c,c−b−1,a,m−1)​,a≥corb≥c,a<canda<c​={6n(n+1)(n∗2+1)⌊a/c⌋2​+(n+1)⌊b/c⌋2+2n⌊a/c⌋⌊b/c⌋+g(a%c,b%c,c,n)+2⌊a/c⌋⌊b/c⌋h(a%c,b%c,c,n)nm(m−1)−2h(c,c−b−1,a,m−1)−f(a,b,c,n)​,a≥corb≥c,a<canda<c​={6n(n+1)(n∗2+1)⌊a/c⌋​+2n(n+1)⌊b/c⌋​+h(a%c,b%c,c,n)21​nm(n+1)−21​f(c,c−b−1,a,m−1)−21​g(c,c−b−1,a,m−1)​,a≥corb≥c,a<canda<c​​

# 生成函数

# 普通生成函数 (Ordinary Generating Function，OGF)

# 定义

定义序列 aaa 的生成函数为 :

F(x)=∑i=0+∞aixiF(x) = \sum_{i = 0} ^{+\infty} a _{i} x ^{i} F(x)=i=0∑+∞​ai​xi

# 运算

  1. 加法运算

F(x)±G(x)=∑i=0+∞(ai±bi)xiF(x) \pm G(x) = \sum _{i = 0} ^{+\infty} (a _{i} \pm b _{i}) x ^{i} F(x)±G(x)=i=0∑+∞​(ai​±bi​)xi

其意义为 (ai±bi)(a _{i} \pm b _{i})(ai​±bi​) 序列的 生成函数

  1. 乘法运算 (卷积)

F(x)∗G(x)=∑i=0+∞(∑j=0iajbi−j)xiF(x) \ast G(x) = \sum _{i = 0} ^{+\infty} \left( \sum _{j = 0} ^{i} a _{j} b_{i-j} \right) x ^{i} F(x)∗G(x)=i=0∑+∞​(j=0∑i​aj​bi−j​)xi

其意义为 ∑i=0naibn−i\sum _{i = 0} ^{n} a _{i} b_{n-i}∑i=0n​ai​bn−i​ 序列的 生成函数

# 封闭形式

根据等比数列求和公式，可得 :

F(x)=∑i=0+∞aixi=a0∗1−x∞1−xF(x) = \sum_{i = 0} ^{+\infty} a _{i} x ^{i} = a _{0} \ast \frac{1 - x ^ {\infty}}{1 - x} F(x)=i=0∑+∞​ai​xi=a0​∗1−x1−x∞​

取 x∈(−1,1)x \in (-1, 1)x∈(−1,1), 则有1−x∞→11 - x ^{\infty} \to 11−x∞→1, 即

F(x)=a0∗1−x∞1−x=a01−xF(x) = a _{0} \ast \frac{1 - x ^ {\infty}}{1 - x} = \frac{a _{0}}{1 - x} F(x)=a0​∗1−x1−x∞​=1−xa0​​

# 牛顿二项式定理

定义组合数 \binom{n}{m} = \frac{n ^{\underline{m}}}{m !} \,, n \in \mathbf{C}, m \in \mathbf

当 n∈Cn \in \mathbf{C}n∈C 时，

(x+1)n=∑i=0+∞(ni)xi=∑i=0+∞Cnixi(x + 1) ^{n} = \sum _{i = 0} ^{+\infty} \binom{n}{i} x ^{i} = \sum _{i = 0} ^{+\infty} C _{n} ^{i} x ^{i} (x+1)n=i=0∑+∞​(in​)xi=i=0∑+∞​Cni​xi
